msbt.message: Doesn't it feel great, just digging? That feeling, when your shovel first breaks the ground, is justsublime. Next time you decide to plant a tree, I hope that you'll think about making it a fruit tree. The more fruit there is to pick on this island, the more fun I can have with baking fruit-filled dessert treats!
On your way to water some plants? Just noticed your watering can
I've read in Ms. Nintendique that you should take advantage of rain to accessorize with an umbrella I wasn't sure I believed that umbrellas could be fashionable, but I love how you look with one.
Oh! Sorry I saw you with an axe just now, and guess I got spooked.It reminded me of a scary scene from a horror novel that I just finished reading.
When you aim your slingshot, do you keep both eyes open? Or do you close one of them? I think that keeping both eyes open might improve my aim, but my aim's not great anyway.
I see you've got a wand Those are the best, letting you change just like magic! It reminds me of being little and swinging a branch around, pretending I could transform.
Were you working on some roads? Well, thank you for your efforts!That's hard labor, so make sure you take lots of breaks and rest.

Working on making a cliff?I just read a novel that ended with the villain confessing to his crime on the edge of a cliff. Is there something special about standing by one that makes you more honest? The danger, maybe?
Were you digging new waterways?Changing the flow of water will make a big impact on our island's look and feel!
Oh, you have a party popper!<10_4 /> Does your heart start to race too, just before you pull the string? Actually, just thinking about that made me start getting nervous!
Planning a climb, ? Always good to be prepared.
So you'd rather pole-vault over a river than cross at a bridge?I guess one's a lot more fun than the other, .
That's a tweeter, isn't it? Anytime I've tried using one, the results have been somewhat anticlimactic. I'm sure you'll have better luck though,
Hey, !It looks like you're having some fun with that bubble stick, .Oh, how I delight in watching those ephemeral bubbles float on the wind. It makes me feel like a kid again!
Tee-hee! I never tire of watching pinwheels spin and spin and spin.I do get dizzy though, .
I love the design on that uchiwa fan you're holding, !I saw it from afar and was drawn to itlike a moth to a fan.
Oh! Do I spy a sparkler in your hand? Those are my favorite, .

I always get nostalgic when I see someone with a balloon.Remember being a wee , when something as simple as a balloon fixed all of life's problems? Oh, well You probably didn't have that exact experience, .

Ooh, off to catch some bugs?I remember catching my first bug just like it was yesterday! It was one of those, um Oh! I just remembered that catching it surprised me so much that I sort of let it escape again.
Trying to catch bugs? Good luck finding some pretty ones!

How's your bug catching going?I saw that you were carrying a net, so I guess I just assumed that was what you were up to, . But maybe you just like carrying a net around everywhere you go I didn't mean to call you out on it.
Everyone says you're the best at catching bugs, .Wish I had your skills, !I'm OK at sneaking up on them, but when I swing my net, I just manage to scare them all away.
I bet all the bugs get scared when they see you coming with that net!Even they must have heard all about your awesome net skills.
Planning to do some fishing? Hopefully, you'll turn out to be better at it than I am!
How's the fishing going?<10_4 /> Hope you're getting a whole bunch of bites, ! Oh! I meant on your fishing line I hope that didn't sound like I was wishing for you to get bitten!
Off to go fishing? Good luck! Not that you'll need it, if all those stories about your skills are true
Everyone says you're the best on the island at fishing! I'm so proud just to know you, . If you ever taught a fishing class, I'd enroll immediately!
Look at you, with your fishing rod! Our resident expert angler, ready to reel in the catch of the day!It must feel great having that kind of confidence, !
You must really love watering to do it even in this weather, !
If you water plants when it's cold like this, does it warm them up just a little bit, ?
You're so attentive to all your plant friends. I'm sure they'll reward you with lots of blossoms, !
